content: In order to ensure a flexible delivery system that accommodates a diverse range of vehicles including bicycles, motorcycles, and trucks, while taking into account various factors such as maximum payload capacity, speed limits, and road restrictions, how can the algorithm be enhanced? Furthermore, in cases where optimizing one key performance indicator (KPI) may have an adverse impact on another, how can the algorithm prioritize the KPIs? Additionally, how can the algorithm factor in real-time changes like traffic congestion and weather conditions, and incorporate them into the system? Please provide a comprehensive and detailed analysis in Latex format, while considering the various complexities involved in creating such an algorithm.
